cab.content: m 353/Ofit. ) trya-9Military Secret 1097From. Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,29th September 1919.(Repeated to Constantinople under my telegram of the 29th instant,No. 75743, M.O. 3.)13281. Malleson wires, 28th September:-"Two Turkish officers left Askabad for Tashkend ly spooiaJ train on 26th September, accompanied by .12 Yamut mounted men and servants. They had reached Askabad via Asterabad and were treated by Bolsheviks with marked distinction and much ceremonial on their departure. Teheran informed."
